DOC.brief_summary: This study two protocol aim : 1 . To identify age-related effect AA incretin secretion whether extent AA exhibit true incretin effect ( gut- mediate increase plasma insulin ) young individual . ( Protocol 1 ) 2 . To define extra-pancreatic `` novel '' , insulin independent effect glucagon like peptide-1 ( GLP-1 ) postprandial muscle protein glucose metabolism microvascular blood flow . ( Protocol 2 )
DOC.brief_title: Characterizing Incretin Effect Amino Acids Defining GLP-1 Role Skeletal Muscle
DOC.detailed_description: Protocol 1 : This explore first aim . 8 Healthy young volunteer recruit go 3 arm cross study . Interventions include oral intravenous amino acid , addition intravenous GLP-1 glucose dependent insulinotropic polypeptide ( GIP ) . 8 old subject also recruit comparison response GI hormones amino acid oral feed young old men . Therefore total number recruit perform protocol 16 . Post intervention visit , measurement take : Insulin , Amino acid , GLP-1 , GIP , Ghrelin peptide YY ( PYY ) . The measurable end point protocol : 1 . Gut hormone level response 2 method AA delivery ( I.V oral ) 2 . Differences gut hormone level young old subject AA 's deliver orally Protocol 2 : This explore second aim . 16 healthy old subject recruit subdivide randomly two group receive either post absorptive postprandial insulin concentration without GLP-1 physiological range cross fashion . During acute study parameter muscle glucose amino acid metabolism test together muscle microvascular recruitment macro vascular flow test leg . The measurable end point protocol : 1 . Muscle Glucose uptake , assess measure 2-deoxyglucose ( 2-DOG ) phosphate muscle biopsy 2 . Myofibrillar protein synthesis , assess via muscle biopsy fractional synthesis rate ( FSR ) 3 . Whole Leg Muscle Protein Synthesis , assess via Arterial-Venous difference ( AV method ) 4 . Whole Leg Muscle Protein Breakdown , assess via AV method 5 . Whole Leg Net Protein Balance , assess via AV method 6 . Muscle microvascular recruitment , assess via microvascular contrast bubble fill refill post destruction ultrasound wave .
DOC.criteria: For protocol 1 : . Aged 1840 6575 year ii . A body mass index ( BMI ) > 18 < 28 kg/m2 For Protocol 2 : . Age 6575 year ii . A body mass index ( BMI ) > 18 < 28 kg/m2 For protocol 1 : . A BMI < 18 > 28 kgÂ·m2 ii . Active cardiovascular disease : uncontrolled hypertension ( BP > 160/100 ) , angina , heart failure ( class III/IV ) , arrhythmia , right leave cardiac shunt recent cardiac event iii . Cerebrovascular disease : previous stroke , aneurysm ( large vessel intracranial ) iv . Respiratory disease include pulmonary hypertension , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , asthma forced expiratory volume 1 minute ( FEV1 ) less 1.5 litre . v. Metabolic disease : hyper hypoparathyroidism , untreated hyper hypothyroidism , Cushing 's disease , type 1 2 diabetes vi . Active inflammatory bowel renal disease vii . Malignancy viii . Recent steroid treatment ( within 6 month ) , hormone replacement therapy ix . Clotting dysfunction x. Musculoskeletal neurological disorder xi . Family history early ( < 55y ) death cardiovascular disease For protocol 2 : Same protocol 1 addition : . Overt muscle waste i.e . muscle mass 1 standard deviation normal muscle fatfree mass age . ii . Taking betaadrenergic block agent nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug iii . Known sensitivity SONOVUE drug use study . iv . Subject deem unsuitable femoral cannulation screen visit .
